<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="SavedSearches-scheduleWindow">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/savedSearches.ts#L603">property <b>scheduleWindow</b></a>

Time window (in minutes) during which the search has lower priority. Defaults to 0. The scheduler can give higher priority to more critical searches during this window. The window must be smaller than the search period.Set to auto to let the scheduler determine the optimal window value automatically. Requires the editSearchScheduleWindow capability to override auto.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-acl">

The app/user context that is the namespace for the resource

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-auth">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L249">property <b>auth</b></a>
</h4>

Splunkbase session token for operations like install and update that require login. Use auth or session when installing or updating an app through Splunkbase.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-author">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L253">property <b>author</b></a>

For apps posted to Splunkbase, use your Splunk account username. For internal apps, include your name and contact information.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-configured">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L259">property <b>configured</b></a>

Custom setup complete indication:
<br>true = Custom app setup complete.
<br>false = Custom app setup not complete.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-description">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L263">property <b>description</b></a>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-explicitAppname">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L267">property <b>explicitAppname</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>explicitAppname?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Custom app name. Overrides name when installing an app from a file where filename is set to true. See also filename.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-filename">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L273">property <b>filename</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>filename?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Indicates whether to use the name value as the app source location.
<br>true indicates that name is a path to a file to install.
<br>false indicates that name is the literal app name and that the app is created from Splunkbase using a template.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-label">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L277">property <b>label</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>label?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

App name displayed in Splunk Web, from five to eighty characters excluding the prefix "Splunk for".

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-name">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L284">property <b>name</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>name?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Literal app name or path for the file to install, depending on the value of filename.
<br>filename = false indicates that name is the literal app name and that the app is created from Splunkbase using a template.
<br>filename = true indicates that name is the URL or path to the local .tar, .tgz or .spl file. If name is the Splunkbase URL, set auth or session to authenticate the request.
The app folder name cannot include spaces or special characters.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-session">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L288">property <b>session</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>session?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Login session token for installing or updating an app on Splunkbase. Alternatively, use auth.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-update">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/appsLocal.ts#L294">property <b>update</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>update?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean'>boolean</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

File-based update indication:
<br>true specifies that filename should be used to update an existing app. If not specified, update defaults to
<br>false, which indicates that filename should not be used to update an existing app.

App version.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AppsLocalArgs-visible">

Indicates whether the app is visible and navigable from Splunk Web.
<br>true = App is visible and navigable.
<br>false = App is not visible or navigable.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-importedRoles">

List of imported roles for this role. <br>Importing other roles imports all aspects of that role, such as capabilities and allowed indexes to search. In combining multiple roles, the effective value for each attribute is value with the broadest permissions.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-searchDiskQuota">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L268">property <b>searchDiskQuota</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchDiskQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specifies the maximum disk space in MB that can be used by a user's search jobs. For example, a value of 100 limits this role to 100 MB total.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-searchFilter">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L272">property <b>searchFilter</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchFilter?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specify a search string that restricts the scope of searches run by this role. Search results for this role only show events that also match the search string you specify. In the case that a user has multiple roles with different search filters, they are combined with an OR.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-searchIndexesAlloweds">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L276">property <b>searchIndexesAlloweds</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchIndexesAlloweds?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

List of indexes that this role has permissions to search. These may be wildcarded, but the index name must begin with an underscore to match internal indexes.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-searchIndexesDefaults">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L280">property <b>searchIndexesDefaults</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchIndexesDefaults?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

List of indexes to search when no index is specified. These indexes can be wildcarded, with the exception that '*' does not match internal indexes. To match internal indexes, start with '_'. All internal indexes are represented by '_*'. A user with this role can search other indexes using "index= "

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-searchJobsQuota">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L284">property <b>searchJobsQuota</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchJobsQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The maximum number of concurrent searches a user with this role is allowed to run. For users with multiple roles, the maximum quota value among all of the roles applies.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesArgs-searchTimeWin">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L288">property <b>searchTimeWin</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchTimeWin?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum time span of a search, in seconds. By default, searches are not limited to any specific time window. To override any search time windows from imported roles, set srchTimeWin to '0', as the 'admin' role does.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-cumulativeRealtimeSearchJobsQuota">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L186">property <b>cumulativeRealtimeSearchJobsQuota</b></a>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>cumulativeRealtimeSearchJobsQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum number of concurrently running real-time searches that all members of this role can have.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-cumulativeSearchJobsQuota">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L190">property <b>cumulativeSearchJobsQuota</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>cumulativeSearchJobsQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum number of concurrently running searches for all role members. Warning message logged when limit is reached.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-defaultApp">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L194">property <b>defaultApp</b></a>

Specify the folder name of the default app to use for this role. A user-specific default app overrides this.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-importedRoles">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L198">property <b>importedRoles</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>importedRoles?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

List of imported roles for this role. <br>Importing other roles imports all aspects of that role, such as capabilities and allowed indexes to search. In combining multiple roles, the effective value for each attribute is value with the broadest permissions.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-name">

The name of the user role to create.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-realtimeSearchJobsQuota">

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>realtimeSearchJobsQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specify the maximum number of concurrent real-time search jobs for this role. This count is independent from the normal search jobs limit.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-searchDiskQuota">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L210">property <b>searchDiskQuota</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchDiskQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specifies the maximum disk space in MB that can be used by a user's search jobs. For example, a value of 100 limits this role to 100 MB total.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-searchFilter">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L214">property <b>searchFilter</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchFilter?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Specify a search string that restricts the scope of searches run by this role. Search results for this role only show events that also match the search string you specify. In the case that a user has multiple roles with different search filters, they are combined with an OR.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-searchIndexesAlloweds">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L218">property <b>searchIndexesAlloweds</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchIndexesAlloweds?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

List of indexes that this role has permissions to search. These may be wildcarded, but the index name must begin with an underscore to match internal indexes.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-searchIndexesDefaults">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L222">property <b>searchIndexesDefaults</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchIndexesDefaults?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String'>string</a></span>&gt;[]&gt;;</code></pre>

List of indexes to search when no index is specified. These indexes can be wildcarded, with the exception that '*' does not match internal indexes. To match internal indexes, start with '_'. All internal indexes are represented by '_*'. A user with this role can search other indexes using "index= "

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-searchJobsQuota">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L226">property <b>searchJobsQuota</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchJobsQuota?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

The maximum number of concurrent searches a user with this role is allowed to run. For users with multiple roles, the maximum quota value among all of the roles applies.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="AuthorizationRolesState-searchTimeWin">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/authorizationRoles.ts#L230">property <b>searchTimeWin</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>searchTimeWin?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Maximum time span of a search, in seconds. By default, searches are not limited to any specific time window. To override any search time windows from imported roles, set srchTimeWin to '0', as the 'admin' role does.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GlobalHttpEventCollectorArgs-maxSockets">

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GlobalHttpEventCollectorArgs-maxThreads">

Maximum number of threads that can be used by active HTTP transactions. Adjusting this value may cause server performance issues and is not generally recommended. Possible values for this setting vary by OS.

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GlobalHttpEventCollectorArgs-port">

</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>port?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

<h4 class="pdoc-member-header" id="GlobalHttpEventCollectorArgs-useDeploymentServer">
<a class="pdoc-child-name" href="https://github.com/pulumi/pulumi-splunk/blob/0f38d8cf474414dda4ca015d9c364aff5b28618a/sdk/nodejs/globalHttpEventCollector.ts#L190">property <b>useDeploymentServer</b></a>
</h4>

<pre class="highlight"><code><span class='kd'></span>useDeploymentServer?: <a href='/docs/reference/pkg/nodejs/pulumi/pulumi/#Input'>pulumi.Input</a>&lt;<span class='kd'><a href='https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number'>number</a></span>&gt;;</code></pre>

Indicates whether the event collector input writes its configuration to a deployment server repository. When this setting is set to 1 (enabled), the input writes its configuration to the directory specified as repositoryLocation in serverclass.conf.
Copy the full contents of the splunkHttpinput app directory to this directory for the configuration to work. When enabled, only the tokens defined in the splunkHttpinput app in this repository are viewable and editable on the API and the Data Inputs page in Splunk Web. When disabled, the input writes its configuration to $SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps by default. Defaults to 0 (disabled).
